# Auto-Merge Test

This file verifies that GitHub Auto-Merge works correctly with our Branch Protection setup.

## Workflow
1. ✅ ClawdBot creates PR
2. ✅ ClawdBot enables auto-merge
3. ⏳ Waiting for Chris to approve
4. ✅ GitHub auto-merges after approval

**Test created:** 2026-02-23 18:30 CET

After successful merge, this file can be deleted.
